description: Unlock new dimensions of frontend design with innovative motion and animation techniques, from responsive text blended with WebGL to playful interactive experiences like virtual T-shirt dressing. Discover how collaboration amplifies great UX, and explore the latest CSS advancements, including the shape() function and contrast-color(). Enhance your designs with SVG optimization tips and create smooth, elastic scrolling effects. Dive into WebGL shaders for creative postprocessing and rethink inclusive design for neurodiversity.
joke: Why do frontend developers love food? Because they can't resist a good CSS (Cascade Style Sheet)!
challenge: Create an interactive art piece using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that responds to the user's scroll position. Blend responsive text with WebGL for dynamic animations, using custom shaders to transform the visuals as you scroll. Optionally, add a canvas element for additional visual effects, integrating ordered dithering or pixelation techniques for a truly unique experience.
